full_text: Welcome to #Ireland @Sophie_Wilmes - great to have your solidarity and support on #Brexit as ever. We continue to work in partnership with 🇧🇪 on many international issues. @dfatirl https://t.co/eAp7dXF1W7
Great positivity from @CorkAirport, looking ahead with confidence… https://t.co/tmNwCEdeKz
Fáilte go Corcaigh! welcome to Cork Harbour HNLMS Karel Doorman 🇳🇱🇪🇺🇮🇪@naval_service @defenceforces @IRLDeptDefence https://t.co/vvDYxUxB74

Deeply concerned at expulsion of UN officials from Ethiopia & fully endorse SG Guterres’ words. UN provides vital humanitarian assistance in Ethiopia. #Ireland will continue to work to help those in need, including those affected by conflict in Tigray.   https://t.co/GYWgFHtcQv
Ryanair to reopen Cork Airport base and restore 20 routes to UK and Europe https://t.co/o6IBcXGoZt
Great to be able to help. @StephenFarryMP https://t.co/yAr6RaobFn

Very warm meeting with ⁦⁦⁦@SpeakerPelosi⁩. Her understanding of & support for #Ireland is so impressive & welcome.  As we work with ⁦@EU_Commission⁩ & UKG to find solutions to NI Protocol, we have stronger bipartisan support than ever in #Washington. ⁦⁦ https://t.co/MbLelfW7S7

President Biden ⁦@POTUS⁩ has been consistent, informed & correct in his analysis of & strong support for NI Protocol. This is a bipartisan position in Washington that remains firm.  I look forward to travelling to Washington tonight. ⁦⁩  https://t.co/qSG4XEXRfr

We continue to work with all Irish Citizens & Irish residents and their families in #Afghanistan who want to leave, to help them do so safely. Good success today, the work continues. @dfatirl @irishmissionun https://t.co/OcRs8KUdOg

Deeply saddened to learn of the passing of Pat Hume. A dedicated and important voice for peaceful change throughout her life just as John was. She leaves a great legacy.    Thinking of her family and friends this evening.
Ireland takes up presidency of the UN Security Council at 'a critical moment' ⁦@irishmissionun⁩ ⁦@dfatirl⁩  https://t.co/oG1Qyd9RUL
75th anniversary of Naval Service marked in Dublin  https://t.co/mnEwKUoVAQ

It’s a huge honour to be entrusted with holding the Presidency of the #UNSC for the month of Sept.- big month ahead for #Ireland at the #UN focusing on #Afghanistan #Ethiopia #Climate #Peacekeeping #Disarmament #HumanRights @irishmissionun https://t.co/z8XWy1tUt4

@rob_voy Your right, there are still far too many people homeless. We in Govt have an obligation to do more to ensure people have a home and support. New housing strategy will be launched later this week which will be a move in the right direction.
Very welcome progress @WFP_MENA @irishmissionun https://t.co/UZd146fmwt
We were v happy to help @StephenFarryMP https://t.co/G4azyGHeg9
Joint Statement on Afghanistan Evacuation Travel Assurances - United States Department of State https://t.co/Ky8YGssJe3
Encouraging international recognition for #Ireland’s efforts to manage #COVID and protect people - still work to do but we’re getting there @HSELive @roinnslainte https://t.co/rrVJnx2OBF

Looking forward to welcoming @EmmanuelMacron @JY_LeDrian @BrunoLeMaire @CBeaune to #Ireland today. The relationship, partnership & friendship between 🇫🇷&🇮🇪 has never been stronger! @dfatirl @IRLDeptDefence @MichealMartinTD https://t.co/xmjbN33iJ1

Our Team of diplomats & Army Rangers in Kabul r safe, busy & doing fantastic work with partners.  We remain in close contact with them to make decisions on exit.  We r also in continuing contact with all Irish individuals & families in Afghanistan to support & advise. @dfatirl

The Tokyo 2020 Paralympic games begin today, and I want to wish the 29 @ParalympicsIRE athletes every success.   At #Tokyo2020, Ireland will compete in 9 sports and we are all behind #TeamIreland in the 16th Summer @Paralympics Games.

Just met senior officials & DF. I’ll tonight approve the sending of a small team of diplomats, supported by Army Rangers, to Kabul Airport. They’ll work with our int partners on the ground to assist in evacuation of remaining Irish citizens. @dfa @IRLDeptDefence @defenceforces

Wishing everybody making the trip to @CrokePark a safe trip - really looking forward to it!  Best of luck to a fantastic @OfficialCorkGAA Team.  #uptherebels #rebelsabú #RebelsRising #AllIrelandHurlingFinal #GAA https://t.co/y2MWnYV3xS

Good journalism - explaining the tragedy & complexity from Kabul.  We continue to work with partners to get Irish citizens out & help as many Afghans at risk as we can. @dfatirl @IRLDeptDefence https://t.co/lgSA9GIMsR
Deeply depressing reports from Afghanistan:  Taliban enter outskirts of Kabul but say they have no plans to take capital ‘by force’ ⁦@dfatirl⁩  https://t.co/rNEaTdhmcl
@TomTugendhat Brave message, will give many others strength and encouragement. Stay well Tom.
One million vaccines donated from Irish, says UNICEF https://t.co/iDQbjFcKZr
What a role model #KellyHarrington is…. #TeamIreland 🥇 https://t.co/Cd2qQDAxE3
Fantastic achievement @Kelly64kg - making a whole country proud! 🇮🇪 https://t.co/8et705JOrH
Brilliant performance!! - Harrington lands lightweight Olympic gold 🇮🇪☘️🇮🇪 #Ireland #Proud  https://t.co/u87Fln3ZHf

Ireland 🇮🇪 expresses its solidarity with Greece 🇬🇷 and its people who are dealing with serious forest fires. Our thoughts are with all those affected by the fires in #Greece and all over Southern Europe. @NikosDendias @GreeceMFA

Great evening in #Skibbereen with ⁦@skibbrowing⁩, celebrating history making athletes. 1st Irish Gold in rowing & 1st Irish women medal in rowing. Incredible achievement. Privileged to meet such modest but inspiring athletes. ⁦@MichealMartinTD⁩ ⁦@jackfchambers⁩ https://t.co/efnYVs9BDs
Congratulations to Paul O'Donovan & Fintan McCarthy on historic Olympic gold rowing medal - fantastic stuff! ☘️🇮🇪 https://t.co/nzg8Wb4kLz

Wow. What a fantastic way to win #Irelands first medals in #Tokyo2020 and our first ever womens medals in rowing - brilliant athletes and even better people! So well done Emily, Aifric, Eimear & Fiona!#proudtobeirish ☘️🇮🇪 https://t.co/JclVALWoPN

Good luck to ⁦@IanMarshall_⁩  joining ⁦@uuponline⁩ - he’s a very impressive politician, intelligent & full of integrity. He’s a strong unionist who understands the different perspectives on this island. I look forward to working with him.  https://t.co/6YmfDTE5bG
Thousands of new homes and jobs: How Cork will grow to balance Dublin ⁦@corkcitycouncil⁩ @acityrising  https://t.co/rJCgPb8h5K

Hard to disagree with any of this article. Without UK/EU trust and partnership, we're not going to be able to implement a protocol that works. Unrealistic asks and threats get us nowhere.... https://t.co/as1Kv6aqxo

Very good news - @AerLingus will not now be proceeding with “layoffs without pay” for staff during the 10 week @CorkAirport runway reconstruction project from September. Good decision - thank u @Paschald for your input and clarification on EWSS.
https://t.co/EX6KVVgaJ9

Privileged to visit Mogadishu to meet Somalia’s PM, FM & Def Min. We discussed completing elections, managing security, state building, women’s empowerment & how Int Community can help. (#Ireland chairs UN Security Council Sanctions Committee on #Somalia) @irishmissionun https://t.co/23YGvQTQ1Y
Des O’Malley (1939-2021). My sincere condolences to his family and friends. A very significant principled politician and family man. RIP. https://t.co/GrRqwFsL0p
https://t.co/5UpoDEE231

#Varosha - fully agree with EU High Rep. UN Security Council resolutions must be respected. Unilateral decisions today by President Erdogan & Mr Tatar will not advance efforts to find a settlement in Cyprus. This remains a priority issue for #Ireland on UNSC. @irishmissionun https://t.co/AqC7C3ryIu
https://t.co/eP8eljPXB3 - International Travel Advice. #staysafe  https://t.co/XS4dVRJIfR

@Gerianam1 Yip absolutely https://t.co/XryqxamUuk
I’ve got a very talented 10yr old daughter gardener! Her Wild flower garden’s great this year - got a chance to enjoy it in the sun today 🌞🌿🌾🌻 https://t.co/D7nDsOC571

This is such a great project for Cork Harbour 🐳🐬. If you haven’t visited the People’s Harbour Park on Haulbowline yet, you need to, it’s a must visit. Well done @Corkcoco @agriculture_ie @IRLDeptDefence @naval_service https://t.co/Tu6BVa1KUH
Our thoughts go out to all those affected by dramatic flooding in #Germany and #Belgium . Such tragic loss of life. ⁦@dfatirl⁩  https://t.co/9gwuZaWer2
€50m revamp of Cork's historic medieval core. ⁦@corkcitycouncil⁩ #acityrising  https://t.co/PCUeTiQQzR

Improving the city centre is essential to ensure #Cork’s future is positive. We will continue to prioritise funding and sustainable growth.  “Cork City Council unveils plan for €46m transformation of city’s medieval quarter” ⁦@corkcitycouncil⁩ ⁦ https://t.co/nLdn0r7zej
@RobbieButlerMLA Robbie I completely agree with your sentiment. Let’s work together to try and agree a way forward that is victim centred and can achieve consensus.
Happy #BastilleDay to all our french friends around the world. #France is our closest #EU neighbour & a closer friend than ever! 🇮🇪🇫🇷🇪🇺 https://t.co/t2w639Vceg

This is not a fait accompli. This is UKG outlining its position. Irish Govt has very different view (Stormont House), as do NI political parties & victims groups. SOSNI & I have committed to an inclusive dialog to try to agree consensus & that’s underway. https://t.co/MCQt5mbKgI

Looking forward to meeting @Tsihanouskaya on Thursday in Dublin. She is amongst friends here in #Ireland. Her courage & determination, with so many others, leading the struggle for a free and democratic #Belarus is inspiring. #Ireland is by your side. @irishmissionun #EU https://t.co/CaOSRGYcTR
@gavreilly Sometimes “headline grabbing” has consequences. What an ignorant, insensitive & offensive comparison. He should know better.
Completely agree… https://t.co/rSg32gPP4u
Congratulations #Italy - worthy European Champions! & commiserations #England - great tournament!

We’re looking forward to welcoming you back to #Ireland. You know you will always have many friends here!  We stand by your side in your struggle to bring change & democracy to #Belarus. @Tsihanouskaya #Ireland https://t.co/sdfXJz40fT
Congratulations to ⁦@OfficialCorkGAA⁩ U20 panel & management - really big result! The future is bright!  https://t.co/fmWqnliVN1

Very proud of #Ireland’s contribution at #UN Security Council today. Getting unanimous support for any resolution to do with #Syria takes months of work. This resolution will save many lives. 🇮🇪🇳🇴🇺🇳 @irishmissionun⁩ ⁦@dfatirl⁩  https://t.co/xqDpwOJYKL
Plans for new road in Cork's south docklands unveiled https://t.co/dphWvyGiUx

Congrats to ⁦@ivanabacik⁩ on her win today. She ran a great campaign & will be an effective TD.  @GeogheganCllr -⁩ you fell just short today but thank u for putting your heart & soul into a really positive campaign, the future for you is v positive in ⁦@FineGael⁩ https://t.co/aa8MZQH97w

Every Hand Up at Security Council !!  Against expectations #Ireland & #Norway managed to get unanimous support for Resolution keeping cross border #UN Humanitarian Aid Corridor open into #Syria - a lifeline for 2.7m people. Great job by our team ⁦@irishmissionun⁩ 🇮🇪🇳🇴🇺🇳 https://t.co/he9H4QsOma

With #Norway, we’ve worked day & night for 6 mths to ensure that cross border aid continues to reach 2.7m #Syrians through Bab Al Hawa Border crossing. Security Council has just adopted our Resolution. Proud & important day for #Ireland - our biggest achievement on UNSC so far! https://t.co/iPsXCmL22O
@catherineheaney @citizensinfo Congratulations - you’ll do a great job.

“UN/Int community have repeatedly called for Israeli Govt to cease unilateral actions & demolitions in West Bank. Residents of Humsa – Al Bqai’a are a protected population; forcing them to leave their homes is contrary to int law applicable in West Bank.” https://t.co/UH3T9SsPAr
@Alan_Dillon Congratulations Alan, special time. Best wishes.

If you’re in Dublin Bay South, don’t forget to get out & vote today!  Vote for stability, for positive politics, for a hardworking candidate who will get things done. Vote No1 James Geoghegan ⁦@FineGael⁩ https://t.co/2YOO84JX0y
